Deleting your FFBE account is not required to stop playing.
Please delete the app as needed.

If you still wish to delete your account， please read all the information below.
If you agree， press the 'Agree' button.
<color=255:240:0>※ Once deleted，gameplay data will be immediately erased and cannot be recovered or reversed.</color>

※ If you delete your account，you will lose all data including your items，unused Lapis，and play data.None of this can be recovered.

※ Please handle friend removal yourself before proceeding.

※ Any previously issued transfer codes will become invalid after account deletion.

※ If you are subscribed to the Digital Ultimania，you must cancel the subscription through your platform provider.

※ Deleting your FFBE account may prevent you from accessing Digital Ultimania content through linked accounts.

※ Please uninstall the app yourself after deletion. Uninstalling the app also deletes Push notification settings.

▼ Linked services that will not be automatically deleted:

・FFBE Newsletter

Subscription settings can be changed through the "SQUARE ENIX BRIDGE" My Page menu.

https://sqex-bridge.jp/jp

・ Unsubscribing from "SQUARE ENIX BRIDGE" also deletes backup data for linked games (not just FFBE). Be careful when unsubscribing.

・FFBE Digital Ultimania

Check platform-specific details through "FFBE Digital Ultimania，App > Menu > Various Settings > Subscription."|

▼ Data that will not be deleted
Even after deleting your FFBE account，the following data will not be deleted:

・Purchase history

・Inquiry history

・FFBE Digital Ultimania registration information

・Push notification settings (deleted upon app uninstallation)
Press the "Agree" button at the bottom if you accept all the above.
